{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3501184,"name":"Miles.D","username":"jom","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/jom/{size}/256684_2.png","created_at":"2025-02-03T22:47:13.832Z","cooked":"

Im back cd and with some more confusion, I used wpilib’s vender dep’s tab and downloaded pathplaners newest version and this error

Screenshot 2025-02-03 163243938×77 5.63 KB

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* Where:
Build file 'C:\Users\Robotics\Downloads\SwerveWithPathPlanner\build.gradle' line: 90

* What went wrong:
Could not determine the dependencies of task ':jar'.
> Could not resolve all files for configuration ':runtimeClasspath'.
   > Could not resolve com.pathplanner.lib:PathplannerLib-java:2025.2.2.
     Required by:
         root project :
      > Could not resolve com.pathplanner.lib:PathplannerLib-java:2025.2.2.
         > Could not get resource 'https://3015rangerrobotics.github.io/pathplannerlib/repo/com/pathplanner/lib/PathplannerLib-java/2025.2.2/PathplannerLib-java-2025.2.2.pom'.
            > Could not GET 'https://3015rangerrobotics.github.io/pathplannerlib/repo/com/pathplanner/lib/PathplannerLib-java/2025.2.2/PathplannerLib-java-2025.2.2.pom'.
               > Got SSL handshake exception during request. It might be caused by SSL misconfiguration
                  > PKIX path building failed: sun.security.provider.certpath.SunCertPathBuilderException: unable to find valid certification path to requested target

I tried to uninstall Pathplaner and then re download it but nothing changed and then I also tried to go down a version but that did not work ether. And I am out of ideas so if you could give me some advice that would be greatly apricated.

Thanks in advanced

Are you on a school network with a web filter? The Gradle error makes me think that something (such as a filter) is interfering with the HTTPS requests to download the package.

What changed since your last thread when you got it working?

A programing debacle Programming
Hello wonderful people of Chiefdelphi I have had a bit of trouble with uploading code to my robot. I feel it is right Infront of my face but I’m just not seeing the solution. [Screenshot 2025-01-27 114737] and whenever I get rid of the path planer library I get this message [Screenshot 2025-01-27 114823] Thank you in advance for helping out I am by myself out here and just trying to stay afloat.
